artist: Kubo Shunman; Poet: Ōta Nanpo; Poet: Ishikawa Masamochi; Poet: Sugawara Nagane; Poet: Kitagawa Kihei
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
life_date: Kubo Shunman, Japanese, 1757–1820; Ōta Nanpo, Poet, Japanese, 1749–1823; Ishikawa Masamochi, Poet, Japanese, 1753–1830; Sugawara Nagane, Poet, Japanese, 1768–1845; Kitagawa Kihei, Poet, Japanese, 1753–1829
medium: Hanging scroll (nikuhitsu), ink and color on silk
signed: with poems above: 蜀山人 {Shokusanjin}; 六樹園 {Rokujuen}; {Nagane}; 真がほ {Magao}; LRC: 俊満題写 (Inscribed and painted by Shunman)
title: Cherry Blossoms with Poems
